Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-3-1-12-v15.06 CREATE ACCESS PROFILE - MULTIPLE SCHEDULES NOT SUPPORTED
Test.Name: Correct response: MultipleSchedulesPerAccessPointSupported = true
Test.Description: 4. If cap.MultipleSchedulesPerAccessPointSupported is equal to true, skip other steps.

Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-3-1-12-v15.06 CREATE ACCESS PROFILE - MULTIPLE SCHEDULES NOT SUPPORTED
Test.Name: Correct response: one schedule
Test.Description: 6. If scheduleCompleteList contains less than two schedules, skip other steps.

Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-3-1-12-v15.06 CREATE ACCESS PROFILE - MULTIPLE SCHEDULES NOT SUPPORTED
Test.Name: Correct response: no schedule
Test.Description: 6. If scheduleCompleteList contains less than two schedules, skip other steps.

Test.TestName: ACCESS_RULES-3-1-12-v15.06 CREATE ACCESS PROFILE - MULTIPLE SCHEDULES NOT SUPPORTED
Test.Name: Correct response: no access points
Test.Description: 8. If accessPointInfoCompleteList is empty, skip other steps.
